__TOC__

This Ubuntu migration procedure makes the following assumptions
* The user knows how to determine the total size (in Megabytes or Gigabytes) of their hard drive(s)
* The user knows the difference between a physical hard drive and a Windows Drive (i.e. C:)
* The user knows what physical hard drive their Windows OS is installed on (this only applies when there is more than one physical hard drive in the machine).
* The user knows the difference between '''Physical Memory''' and '''Hard Drive Space'''
* The user is familiar with the term '''partition''' on a physical hard drive
* The user is familiar with the term '''dual boot'''
